name: PENNSYLVANIA HEARING AID DEALERS ASSOCIATION, INC., et al., Appellants, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH et al.
name_abbreviation: Pennsylvania Hearing Aid Dealers Ass'n v. Commonwealth, Department of Health

judges: Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
O’BRIEN, C.J., and WILKINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: PENNSYLVANIA HEARING AID DEALERS ASSOCIATION, INC., et al., Appellants, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH et al.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Order, 53 Pa.Cmwlth. 495, 417 A.2d 1340, affirmed.
O’BRIEN, C.J., and WILKINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: James L. Walsh, Harrisburg, for appellants.
Reed Hamilton, Asst. Atty. Gen., for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
430 A.2d 1150
PENNSYLVANIA HEARING AID DEALERS ASSOCIATION, INC., et al., Appellants, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH et al.
No. 80-2-313.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 21, 1981.
Decided June 4, 1981.
James L. Walsh, Harrisburg, for appellants.
Reed Hamilton, Asst. Atty. Gen., for appellees.
Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
